author: Fred Flintstone
text: Slowly watching myself revert to the old me....and I'm OK with it... 🤷🏾

author: Fred Flintstone
text: If I have to explain step by step what to do... Fuck it ..I'll do by myself...

author: Fred Flintstone
text: Haven't been pass my mailbox since last weekend... and I'm fine with that.  #reclusive
